tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE loans (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_id INT,
  musician_id INT,
  loan_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE instruments (
  instrument_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_name VARCHAR(50),
  instrument_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE musicians (
  musician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  musician_name VARCHAR(50),
  musician_contact VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Loan (
  loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_id INT,
  musician_id INT,
  loan_start_date DATE,
  loan_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Instrument (
  instrument_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  instrument_name TEXT,
  instrument_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Musician (
  musician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  musician_name TEXT,
  musician_instrument_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE LoanHistory (
  loan_id INT,
  musician_id INT,
  loan_date DATE,
  return_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Instruments ( 
  instrument_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  instrument_name VARCHAR(255), 
  loaned_to_musician_id UUID, 
  loan_start_date DATE, 
  loan_end_date DATE 
)

CREATE TABLE Musicians ( 
  musician_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  musician_name VARCHAR(255), 
  musician_contact VARCHAR(255) 
)

CREATE TABLE Loans ( 
  loan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  instrument_id UUID, 
  musician_id UUID, 
  loan_start_date DATE, 
  loan_end_date DATE 
)

CREATE TABLE LoanHistory ( 
  loan_id UUID, 
  instrument_id UUID, 
  musician_id UUID, 
  loan_start_date DATE, 
  loan_end_date DATE, 
  returned_date DATE 
)

CREATE TABLE Locations ( 
  location_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  location_name VARCHAR(255), 
  location_address VARCHAR(255) 
)
